props.name: measureLocation
props.description: Where the measure percent will be located.

props.name: label
props.description:
Text description of current progress value to display instead of
percentage.

props.name: valueText
props.description:
Accessible text description of current progress value, for when value is
not a percentage. Use with label.
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: children
props.description: What should be rendered inside progress bar.
Additional props are spread to the container <div>

props.name: label
props.description: Label to indicate what progress is showing.
